text: Tumi ki laksya kara na ye prthibite ya kichu ache allah ta tomadera adhina karechena, ara jahajagulo'o ya tamra nirdese samudre bicarana karache. Ara tini akasake thekiye rakhena tamra anumati byatireke prthibira upare para theke. Nihsandeha allah manusadera prati to parama snehamaya, aphuranta phaladata.
